topic.title: New Responsive-theme Video Portal proof of concept!
topic.body:
I'm aiming to make this a video portal website proof of concept. I want to integrate WebTorrent video streaming to make it a truly decentralised uncensorable video website!

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AtRr9BPxKkPswG4uKn17bht2JCdv2cMqt/

topic.title: ZeroFileShare - Share Files using P2P WebTorrent
topic.body: Based on someone else's site, but made as a backup. Will have significant design changes when time permits: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DZSMYvbbsX6gbcpHEez5cGWBG7DLgVjxT/

topic.title: Test to see if the embedded PDFs and Im ages work
topic.body: Please let me know if you can download the riffle.pdf and whether you can see the image on the "blablabla" post: http://127.0.0.1:43110/15eqKjfTfECvBGt2fUemQfcn6NMV37t6WT/
